about_the_game:
Are you ready to take on the tickling adventure of a lifetime?

Be your own person!

Tickle Magnet allows you to choose your character's look, name, and gender. The romance options in Tickle Magnet are not impacted by these decisions, so you have free will to pursue whomever you like!

Enjoy Tickling Mayhem!

Tickle Magnet is developed by a tickler, and written by a team of tickling authors. This is an adventure that is primarily focused on tickling fetish content. While the game also contains foot fetish, public humiliation, bondage & domination content, and good old fashioned sexual content, tickling is the focus. There are scenes where you, as the player, found yourself being tickled by others. There are scenes in which you, as the player, are tickling others. There are tickling scenes you are a witness to.

Explore Fully Fleshed out Characters!

There are five close friends and seven secondary characters that the players can grow close bonds with. In some cases, the player may pursue more intimate relationships with multiple characters in game. Twelve of the characters in game have voice acted parts, including combat phrases, daily expressions, monologues, laughter, and sexual sounds. Each of the five close friends have complex personalities and emotions, which can be explored as you spend time with them.

Explore the town!

The fictitious town of Ravensworth is home to Ravensworth University, where the player and their friends attend. You can explore the university, its facilities, and the town which bears its name. It is a small town in rural, modern day America. A town with a thriving student population, well traversed main street, and a colorful cast of characters to bring it to life.

Solve the mystery!

An unknown villain in Ravensworth has been kidnapping students from campus. Work with your friends to find clues and unravel the mystery.

content_descriptors.notes:
The game contains fetishist depictions of tickling.  These depictions include both consensual scenes of tickling and tickle torture, along with non-consensual scenes of tickling and tickle torture.

The collectibles in the game frequently depict adults in provocative poses, with some imagery including topless women.

Some of the optional stories involving intimacy in the game can include adult audio, including sounds of characters enjoying sexy and experiencing orgasm through sexual activity.

The main storyline includes the impact of trauma and non-consensual tickle torture on some of the characters.

Topics such as BDSM occur frequently in the game,

name: Tickle Magnet

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4340 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGL / VRAM 1GB or better
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Make laughter, make love, make friends, and make memories in this tongue-in-cheek tickling fetish simulation. Set in modern day America, spend your sophomore year in college investigating a series of mysterious kidnappings while balancing your finances, your love life, and your school work.
